Technique: ROUGH-HEWN; WRITTEN WITH A REED PEN/REED WITH SPLIT NIB
Name: Hieratic ostracon
Description: The recto of this ostracon comprises of 10 lines of text written in hieratic. It is a magical formula addressed to the goddess Isis. The verses are separated by points, painted in red. The date at the end of the text (4th month of the summer) is equally noted in red. The formula written on the verso of the ostracon is totally erased.
